markdownRemark.html: This is a private club to play golf in Almeria, with an impressive 18-hole course. This is a beautiful flat golf course with wide fairways and lots of water. It has a driving range, with putting green and small areas of chip.

frontmatter.title: Club de Golf Playa Serena
frontmatter.description: Club de Golf Playa Serena -  This is a private club to play golf in Almeria, with an impressive 18-hole course. This is a beautiful flat golf course with wide fairways and lots of water. It has a driving range, with putting green and small areas of chip.
frontmatter.address: Urb. del Golf, Paseo del Golf, 8 04740 Roquetas de Mar, Almer√≠a, Spain
frontmatter.price: Highest green fee weekdays 65.00 euros, Highest green fee weekends 65.00 euros
